name: USD CoinVertible
description: USD CoinVertible (USDCV) is a regulated, fiat-backed stablecoin issued by SG-FORGE, pegged 1:1 to the U.S. dollar and fully redeemable. Reserves are held in segregated accounts with independent custody and disclosed daily for transparency. Compliant with EU MiCA rules, USDCV enables 24/7 on-chain settlement, cross-border payments, FX and cash management, and integration into DeFi and institutional workflows. It launches on Ethereum and Solana, initially available via regulated European exchanges.
